Text:
What on earth...?! Dealing with just one was a
handful, but twelve of them?!

What are you scared of, Gamma? I'm a dragon slayer!
These guys are no match for someone like me!
*inhales*...*exhales*...
...Hyaaaaaahhh!!!
Ha-ruff?!

Ugh.. Th-These guys! They're way faster than the one
we defeated before!

How can they move so swiftly despite their massive
bodies?! And it's like they're precisely calculating
the distance!

Heheheh...! You lot are incapable of grasping the
true form of this dragon!
True form... What's that?
Malaks! Crush them!
Hey, I asked you a question...
He's obviously not going to answer!
Eta!

They're acting completely different from what I was
told! What's going on?!
Could it be...they've been tamed...?

But why are their movements so refined?! Even tamed
monsters don't move like this!
He's escaping!
Lady Alpha, we can't let Sergey escape—
...No need to worry.
He is here.
He...? You don't mean...?
Yes. Our Master Shadow.
Master...Shadow...?

So...everything...was orchestrated by him. Lurking
in the shadows, he watches over the world, never
allowing the diabolical Cult's schemes to succeed
as he wields the sword of unflinching judgment—

It started in the land of Madlid, and it will end
here... It all makes sense now, my lord!

I really wanted to see Boss man taking 'em down...
but I'll take out these dragons for Boss man
instead!

Under the guidance of my lord, a frenzied rhapsody
will resonate throughout this land! I, Epsilon, shall
complete it magnificently!

The fleeing, scattering rats of the Cult will never
escape my lord's sight—

Master, I'm looking forward to how you'll dissect
him...!
Their morale has improved dramatically...!

How is Master Shadow...such a formidable
presence...?!

Alright, everyone! Let's thoroughly crush these
dragons! We can't let anything interfere with our
lord's battle.

Beta, Gamma, Epsilon, you three take on one dragon
at a time! Gamma, you lead the charge and block any
attacks against the other two.
Roger that!
Understood!
I'll take center position! Got it!

Delta, you keep wreaking havoc on your own! No. 111
and No. 122, you're supporting Delta!
Hyaaaah! Sure thing!
Understood!

Zeta and Eta, keep the unengaged dragons in check!
Aim for their eyes and feet to keep slowing them
down!
Right, leave it to me—
A large-scale experiment, huh? Heheh...!
Shadow... For the future forged by your sword!

(One seems to be straying here from Alpha and the
others.)

(I doubt they unintentionally let someone escape...
so maybe this is their little treat to me?)

(Looks like they're thinking about me, and not just
enjoying hunting thieves on their own.)

Well, not that I have any intention of compromising
anyway when it comes to the white truffles—

(Wait, whoever's coming this way is faster than I
thought. They're already here.)
What... A kid...?!
No... Who the hell...are you?!
Heh... Just a mushroom hunter passing by—

(...Wait, if Alpha and the others are sharing their
spoils, no need to play the part of a common
mushroom hunter. In that case!)
—But that's just a guise I wear to conceal myself!
What?!
...My name is Shadow.
I lurk in the darkness and hunt down shadows...!
